comment: ContactLineSystem + mapped from ERA ontology by Smart Data Models adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ERA/master/ContactLineSystem/schema.json
description: System that is used to transmit electrical energy to road or rail vehicles.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: conditionalRegenerativeBrake
contents.comment: Permission for regenerative braking

contents.name: conditionsAppliedRegenerativeBraking
contents.comment: Conditions applying in regards to regenerative braking

contents.name: conditionsChargingElectricEnergyStorage
contents.comment: Permitted conditions for charging electric energy storage for traction purposes at standstill

contents.name: contactLineSystemType
contents.comment: Type of contact line system

contents.name: currentLimitationRequired
contents.comment: Current or power limitation on board required

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: energySupplySystem
contents.comment: Energy supply system

contents.name: energySupplySystemTSICompliant
contents.comment: Energy supply system TSI compliant

contents.name: maxCurrentStandstillPantograph
contents.comment: Maximum current at standstill per pantograph

contents.name: maxTrainCurrent
contents.comment: Maximum train current

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: permissionChargingElectricEnergyTractionStandstill
contents.comment: Permission for charging electric energy storage for traction purposes at standstill

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: umax2
contents.comment: Umax2 for lines referred to in sections 7.4.2.2.1 and 7.4.2.11.1 of Regulation (EU)1301/2014.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
